name: SpaceWormsSurvival
description:
First game ever in Godot !!

Created in order to start learning game development, I made this little game for the Mini Jam 24,  with the useful resources of the official Godot Documentation to discover the engine's logic, and the very nice PiskelApp to create the pixel art designs.

Theme : Space

Limitations : controls -> mouse buttons only !

Available platform : Linux only
